name: nativescript-hook-environment-filter
description: Hook for selecting files based on DTAP environment build for NativeScript Apps

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && ENV=tst tns emulate ios --log trace
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.preparedemo: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-hook-environment-filter && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.resetdemo: cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-hook-environment-filter && tns plugin add .. && tns prepare android && tns prepare ios && cd ..
scripts.afterprepare: cd demo && tns prepare android && tns prepare ios && cd ..
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
